General.Name: 63 moons technologies limited
General.Description: 63 moons technologies limited provides computer programming, consulting, and related services in India and internationally. The company provides DOME, an online trading software; POWERARMS, an electronic trading, risk management, and clearing and settlement platform for energy markets; MARKETXSTREAM that provides advanced analytics and quantification; FOVEA, an agile risk management solution; and CNS, a clearing and settlement application. It also provides Risk Management solution to identify and mitigate risks; DMATS, a depository for multi asset transaction system; e-KYC, an online client on-boarding solution; Trading core, an order management and risk management system; a web-based trading platforms under the TRADEDART, Dealer, and Diet names. In addition, the company offers Program Trading, an ultra-low latency high frequency trading platform; Aero; Institutional, an execution solution; Protector, a post-trade risk management solution; Match for end-to-end post-trade; STP-Gate, a single window post-trade transaction processing service; and e-Hastakshar, a digital document signing solution. Further, it provides Voice Cast, a voice messaging service; BTS clous services, an IT infrastructure and application management solution; Tech Trader that automates trading; Voice Logger, a call management and recording solution; mutual fund solution; wave 2.0, a mobile trading application; and Riskalculator and DataCollector. Further, it provides trading, procurement, process management, risk consultancy, shared business support, IT infrastructure sharing, NBFC, Internet telecommunication, training, and certification and franchise services. The company was formerly known as Financial Technologies (India) Limited and changed its name to 63 moons technologies limited in May 2016. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Mumbai, India.
